meanings.definition: A genre of music combining elements of electronic dance music and pop music.
meanings.sent1: I love dancing to technopop music at parties.
meanings.sent2: Technopop songs are catchy and upbeat.
meanings.sent3: The robots at the dance party only played technopop tunes.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like technopop, a perfect blend of electronic beats and pop melodies.
meanings.sent5: The technopop concert was a fusion of futuristic sounds and familiar pop rhythms.

meanings.definition: To create or perform music in the technopop genre.
meanings.sent1: She decided to technopop her new album to appeal to a wider audience.
meanings.sent2: They technopop together in their home studio every weekend.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to technopop along to the electronic beat of the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: His fingers danced across the keyboard, technopopping a new melody into existence.
meanings.sent5: The band technopopped their way to the top of the charts with their latest single.
